Text:
I need to populate the dataset with the values returned in a stored procedure in db2. I have written a some code which connected to the DB and seems to execute the SP but am clueless as too how to populate a dataset. I need 


    Imports IBM.Data
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2.DB2DataReader

    Dim conn As DB2Connection = New DB2Connection(cs)
    conn.Open()


    Dim trans As IDbTransaction = conn.BeginTransaction()
    Dim cmd As IDbCommand = conn.CreateCommand()
    Dim procName As String = "SP_NAME"
    cmd.Transaction = trans
    cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure
    cmd.CommandText = procName
    cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()

Appreciate the help. 

THanks

I need to populate the dataset with the values returned in a stored procedure in db2. I have written a some code which connected to the DB and seems to execute the SP but am clueless as too how to populate a dataset. It throws an exception at the fill command.


    Imports IBM.Data
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2.DB2DataReader

    Dim conn As DB2Connection = New DB2Connection(cs)
    conn.Open()


    Dim trans As IDbTransaction = conn.BeginTransaction()
    Dim cmd As IDbCommand = conn.CreateCommand()
    Dim procName As String = "SP_NAME"
    cmd.Transaction = trans
    cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure
    cmd.CommandText = procName
    Dim db2da As New DB2DataAdapter
    Dim db2ds As New DataSet
    cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()

Appreciate the help. 

THanks

I need to populate the dataset with the values returned in a stored procedure in db2. I have written a some code which connected to the DB and seems to execute the SP and am populating the dataset but am not find able to figure out how to display the data from teh dataset to the grid.


    Imports IBM.Data
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2.DB2DataReader

    Dim conn As DB2Connection = New DB2Connection(cs)
    conn.Open()


    Dim trans As IDbTransaction = conn.BeginTransaction()
    Dim cmd As IDbCommand = conn.CreateCommand()
    Dim procName As String = "SP_NAME"
    cmd.Transaction = trans
    cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure
    cmd.CommandText = procName
    Dim db2da As New DB2DataAdapter
    Dim db2ds As New DataSet
    db2da.SelectCommand = cmd
    cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()
     db2da.Fill(db2ds)

Appreciate the help. 

THanks

I solved the problem with the data not displaying and have corrected the code below. 



I need to populate the dataset with the values returned in a stored procedure in db2. I have written a some code which connected to the DB and seems to execute the SP and am populating the dataset but am not find able to figure out how to display the data from the dataset to the grid. Right now it is blank an no data in the grid.




    Imports IBM.Data
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2.DB2DataReader
    Dim conn As DB2Connection = New DB2Connection(cs)
    conn.Open()


    Dim trans As IDbTransaction = conn.BeginTransaction()
    Dim cmd As IDbCommand = conn.CreateCommand()
    Dim procName As String = "SP_Name"
    cmd.Transaction = trans
    cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure
    cmd.CommandText = procName
    Dim db2da As New DB2DataAdapter
    Dim db2ds As New DataSet
    db2da.SelectCommand = cmd
    cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()
    db2da.Fill(db2ds, "Tab1")

    Dim introwcount As Integer = db2ds.Tables("Tab1").Rows.Count
    Dim intColumncount As Integer = db2ds.Tables("Tab1").Columns.Count

    dgvData.DataSource = db2ds.Tables("Tab1")

Appreciate the help. 

Thanks

I solved the problem with the data not displaying and have corrected the code below. 



I need to populate the dataset with the values returned in a stored procedure in db2. I have written a some code which connected to the DB and seems to execute the SP and am populating the dataset but am not find able to figure out how to display the data from the dataset to the grid. Right now it is blank an no data in the grid.




    Imports IBM.Data
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2
    Imports IBM.Data.DB2.DB2DataReader
    
    'cs is the connection string you create in your application.

    Dim conn As DB2Connection = New DB2Connection(cs)
    conn.Open()


    Dim trans As IDbTransaction = conn.BeginTransaction()
    Dim cmd As IDbCommand = conn.CreateCommand()
    Dim procName As String = "SP_Name"
    cmd.Transaction = trans
    cmd.CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedure
    cmd.CommandText = procName
    Dim db2da As New DB2DataAdapter
    Dim db2ds As New DataSet
    db2da.SelectCommand = cmd
    cmd.ExecuteNonQuery()
    db2da.Fill(db2ds, "Tab1")

    Dim introwcount As Integer = db2ds.Tables("Tab1").Rows.Count
    Dim intColumncount As Integer = db2ds.Tables("Tab1").Columns.Count

    dgvData.DataSource = db2ds.Tables("Tab1")

Appreciate the help. 

Thanks
